name: SaaS Competitive Analysis
description: Competitive positioning analysis for SaaS product
context: We're a mid-market CRM platform competing against Salesforce, HubSpot, and emerging players like Pipedrive and Freshworks. We need to clearly articulate our differentiated position and identify white space opportunities where we can win.
dataPoints: Our current share: 2.3% in target segment
Time to value: 2 weeks (vs 3 months Salesforce)
